ingredients: 10  fresh hot chile peppers, stems removed, 1  onion, coarsely chopped,   +   1/4 cup pitted fresh dates, or more to taste,   +   1/4 cup fresh basil leaves,   +   1/4 cup fresh parsley leaves, 1  roma (plum) tomato, roughly chopped, 2 tablespoons beef bouillon powder, 4  garlic cloves,   +   1/2 cup vegetable oil, or as needed,   salt to taste, 1 squeeze lemon juice
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 29mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 1g 0%, Dietary Fiber 0g 0%, Total Sugars 0g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 11mg 57%, Calcium 2mg 0%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 21mg 0%
